sqlMap.select: SELECT PER_ID as id, PER_FIRST_NAME as firstName, PER_LAST_NAME as lastName, PER_BIRTH_DATE as birthDate, PER_WEIGHT_KG as weightInKilograms, PER_HEIGHT_M as heightInMeters FROM PERSON WHERE PER_ID = #value#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PERSON (PER_ID, PER_FIRST_NAME, PER_LAST_NAME, PER_BIRTH_DATE, PER_WEIGHT_KG, PER_HEIGHT_M) VALUES (#id#, #firstName#, #lastName#, #birthDate#, #weightInKilograms#, #heightInMeters#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PERSON SET PER_FIRST_NAME = #firstName#, PER_LAST_NAME = #lastName#, PER_BIRTH_DATE = #birthDate#, PER_WEIGHT_KG = #weightInKilograms#, PER_HEIGHT_M = #heightInMeters# WHERE PER_ID = #id#
